thread.section_title: McElhinneys Department Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of McElhinneys Department Store | mcelhinneys.com
thread.title: DYMPNA
thread.title_full: McElhinneys Department Store reviewed by DYMPNA

author: DYMPNA
title: DYMPNA
text: The service from McElhinneys was excellent but I was disappointed that the item I had seen was no longer available and it took some days to become aware of this. I'm glad that I didn't need it in a hurry or I would have been in a panic to get a replacement. I would suggest that the website be updated more regularly so that items out of stock are taken of the list. I was refunded immediately following a phonecall
